chats.Message: Hello! Welcome to your first day as a storage engineer
Do you need a rundown of your role here?
Of course you do, its your first day
Your job is to move files as they arive to their relevant storage places.
File arrive in the green File Transfer Area window
You need to drag and drop files and folders on the correct drives.
You need to first open the correct drive, by double clicking it.
Make sure you have enough space on the drive!
Lastly, you need follow all the procudes in the Storage Rules document
